rooms.name: Entrance to The School
rooms.description: This is the entrance to the School. Type "NORTH" or simply N to go north and proceed through the School.. If you have been here before, go down to the Docks.

exits.description: You see a path into another room.
Below you see an expansive world, ready for exploration.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light bounces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The exits are west and south. A small plaque is on the wall.

You may look at the sign or plaque by using the LOOK <target> command. Try it now.

exits.description: You see the beginning of the School.

Equipment check time! Type 'equipment' to see your current equipment. Right now, you just have a vest, shield, and a weapon. As you go through the School, you will acquire a full set of equipment.

To pick up items on the ground as you see them, type 'GET <item>'.
To wear a piece of armor, type 'WEAR <item>'.
To hold a light source, tyoe 'HOLD <light>'.
To wield a weapon, type 'WIELD <weapon>'.
To stop using a piece of equipment, type 'REMOVE <item>'.
Finally, to see your inventory, type 'INVENTORY'.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light bounces off the ceiling in soft white tones. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. Exits lead in ALL directions

exits.description:
This is the movement practicing room. The directions you can go in any room are: north, south, east, west, up, or down. Of course, not all rooms have all exits available.

 To see all obvious exits in a room, type 'EXITS'.

Sometimes doors are closed, locked, or secret. Then you have to notice clues in the room description or try going into that direction and see that you bump into a door.

Try going in each direction. When you are done, go NORTH.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is north.

exits.description: Go north to get back to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is east.

exits.description: Go east to get back to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is down.

exits.description: Go down to get back to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is up.

exits.description: Go up to get back to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  The exits lead north and south.

exits.description: You see the combat room ahead.
Since you are here, let's have another lesson. You can see the statistics on yourself by typing 'SCORE'. Do that right now. At higher levels, 'SCORE' gives you more information.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in the cage room. Below is a cage with a monster. The next station is to the south.

exits.description: You see the next station ahead.

Time to fight! The first lesson is knowing whom to fight. Use the command 'CONSIDER' to consider killing a monster (mob). Avoid fighting monsters that will kill you easily.

When you're ready, type 'KILL <monster>' to begin attacking the monster.

Once the monster is dead, you may get items from its corpse by typing 'GET ALL CORPSE'. When you are done, you may sacrifice the corpse to your gods by typing 'SACRIFICE corpse'. Your god should reward you for this.

Between fights, you may need to rest to recover much-needed Hitpoints, Mana, or Movement. You can do this by typing 'SLEEP'. When you are ready to wake, type 'WAKE'.

rooms.name: The Jail Cell
rooms.description: You are in a metal cage. Blood and guts are scattered across the floor and walls. There's a sign on the wall. The only exit is back up!

exits.description:
Time to fight! The first lesson is knowing whom to fight. Use the command 'CONSIDER' to consider killing a monster (mobs). Avoid fighting mobs that will kill you easily.
When you're ready, type 'KILL <monster>' to begin attacking the monster. Now, go DOWN and fight your first opponent!

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows. Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a sign on the wall.  Find your own exit here.

exits.description:
A challenge is coming up ahead! To the west is a store. Inside the store, you can use these commands:

BUY    Buy an item.

LIST   List what is for sale.

After buying a potion, type 'DRINK potion' to drink it.

After that, find the next exit yourself!

rooms.name: The School Emporium
rooms.description: You are in a cramped room. Stacked neatly on the shelves are items and packages. Of course, there's a sign on the wall. The only exits are north and east.

exits.description:
The sign reads:

BUY   - Buy something from the storekeeper
LIST  - The storekeeper will tell you what's for sale
VALUE - The storekeeper will tell you how much he will give you for that item
SELL  - Sell that item to the storekeeper.

rooms.name: A Room in the School
rooms.description: You are in a square white room. The walls are all blank, with no windows. Of course, there is a sign on the wall. The exits are to the south and west.

exits.description:
West of you is a dark room. I hope you still have the lantern! If not, you'll have to go back to the store to buy one.

In the room is a thief with a key that you need. After killing the thief and getting the key, come back here, UNLOCK EAST, OPEN EAST, and continue east.

rooms.name: The Darkened Room
rooms.description: This room was purposefully darkened so that you would need to hold a light source to go through. The room is white and has blank walls. The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: The End of the School
rooms.description: This is an extremely bright room, with a marble pedestal in the center. Behind the pedestal stands a person cloaked in a robe. Tapestries flow from every wall, and you feel very happy to be here right now. There is a big sign here. The only exit is behind you to the west.

exits.description:
You have graduated from the School! Get your diploma from the pedestal by typing 'GET diploma pedestal'. Once you have done so, you may return to the Real World by typing 'RECALL'.

If you need more help during the game, type 'HELP'. You may also chat with other players by typing 'CHAT <message>'.

Good luck and enjoy your adventures!
